senses.sense_definition: A county in the central part of England, with Bedford as its county town.

examples.text: My grandparents live in a quiet village in <w>Bedfordshire</w>.
The historic county of <w>Bedfordshire</w> is bordered by Cambridgeshire and Hertfordshire.

senses.sense_definition: A humorous or playful term for bed or the act of going to sleep, used as a pun on the word 'bed'.

examples.text: The children are tired, so it is time to send them up to <w>Bedfordshire</w>.
I have an early start tomorrow, so I am heading off to <w>Bedfordshire</w> now.
